//Show Me: Account Name, Age
//By: Created Date
//Where: Created Date = Current and Previous FY
//Object: CTA

Delete[Select ID from JBCXM__UIViews__c where name in ('Auto_SummarizedByWeek_Chart','Auto_SummarizedByWeek_Grid','Auto_SummarizedByYear_Chart','Auto_SummarizedByQuarter_Chart','Auto_SummarizedByMonth_Chart','Auto_SummarizedByYear_Grid','Auto_SummarizedByQuarter_Grid','Auto_SummarizedByMonth_Grid')];
Delete[Select id from JBCXM__Dashboard__c where name = 'SummarizedBy_Layout'];
Delete[Select id from JBCXM__C360Sections__c where name = 'SummarizedBy_RL'];

//Adding Related List for CTA object
Integer currentDisplayOrder = [SELECT count() FROM JBCXM__C360Sections__c ];
JBCXM__C360Sections__c rList = new JBCXM__C360Sections__c(Name = 'SummarizedBy_RL',
														  JBCXM__DisplayLabel__c = 'SummarizedBy_RL',
														  JBCXM__AccountReference__c = 'JBCXM__Account__c',
														  JBCXM__DisplayOrder__c = currentDisplayOrder +1,
														  JBCXM__InAccountWidget__c = true,
														  JBCXM__InCustomer360__c = true,
														  JBCXM__InOpportunityWidget__c = true,
														  JBCXM__IsActive__c = true,
														  JBCXM__isStandardObject__c = true,
														  JBCXM__ObjectName__c = 'JBCXM__CTA__c',
														  JBCXM__Type__c = 'RelatedList');

insert rList;


List<JBCXM__UIViews__c> pbr = new List<JBCXM__UIViews__c>();

//Summ by Week - Chart
JBCXM__UIViews__c viewObj = new JBCXM__UIViews__c(
	name = 'Auto_SummarizedByWeek_Chart',
	JBCXM__AccountReference__c = 'JBCXM__Account__c',
	JBCXM__BaseObject__c = 'JBCXM__CTA__c',
	JBCXM__ColumnList__c = '[{"name":"JBCXM__Account__r.Name","label":"Account Name","displayOrder":1,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"JBCXM__CTA__c","fieldType":"TEXT","isGroupable":true,"hasJBCXMNS":false,"decimalPlaces":0},{"name":"JBCXM__Age__c","label":"Age","displayOrder":2,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"JBCXM__CTA__c","fieldType":"DOUBLE","isGroupable":false,"hasJBCXMNS":false,"decimalPlaces":0},{"name":"JBCXM__CreatedDate__c","label":"Created Date","displayOrder":3,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"JBCXM__CTA__c","fieldType":"DATE","isGroupable":true,"hasJBCXMNS":false,"decimalPlaces":"0"}]',
	JBCXM__Dimensions__c = '[{"summerizedBy":"CW","objectName":"JBCXM__CTA__c","name":"JBCXM__CreatedDate__c","label":"Created Date","groupable":true,"aliasName":"Cat1","fieldType":"DATE","hasJBCXMNS":false,"stacked":false}]',
	JBCXM__FilterConditions__c = null,
	JBCXM__GraphType__c = 'STACKED-COLUMN',
	JBCXM__HavingClause__c = '{"filterLogic":"","filterCriteria":[]}',
	JBCXM__IsRB__c = true,
	JBCXM__IsShown__c = true,
	JBCXM__IsStandard__c = false,
	JBCXM__Measures__c = '[{"objectName":"JBCXM__CTA__c","name":"JBCXM__Account__r.Name","label":"Count of Account Name","graphType":null,"aggType":"COUNT","aliasName":"DS1","fieldType":"TEXT","hasJBCXMNS":false,"decimalPlaces":0},{"objectName":"JBCXM__CTA__c","name":"JBCXM__Age__c","label":"Sum of Age","graphType":null,"aggType":"SUM","aliasName":"DS2","fieldType":"DOUBLE","hasJBCXMNS":false,"decimalPlaces":0}]',
	JBCXM__QueryOptions__c	= null,
	JBCXM__ReportParams__c	= null,
	JBCXM__SectionId__c = rList.Id,
	JBCXM__ShowDefault__c = false,
	JBCXM__UITabName__c = 'CTA',
	JBCXM__Visibility__c = 'Public',
	JBCXM__VisualType__c = 'Chart',
	JBCXM__WhereClause__c = '{"filterLogic":"JBCXM__1","filterCriteria":[{"value":"JBlast90","objectName":"JBCXM__CTA__c","fieldType":"TIMEFRAMENORMALDATE","logicalOperator":"AND","operator":"e","name":"JBCXM__CreatedDate__c","isNull":false,"fieldLabel":"Created Date","alias":"JBCXM__1","locked":false}]}'
);
pbr.add(viewObj);

//Summ by Week - Grid
 viewObj = new JBCXM__UIViews__c(
	name = 'Auto_SummarizedByWeek_Grid',
	JBCXM__AccountReference__c = 'JBCXM__Account__c',
	JBCXM__BaseObject__c = 'JBCXM__CTA__c',
	JBCXM__ColumnList__c = '[{"name":"JBCXM__Account__r.Name","label":"Account Name","displayOrder":1,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"JBCXM__CTA__c","fieldType":"TEXT","isGroupable":true,"hasJBCXMNS":false,"decimalPlaces":0},{"name":"JBCXM__Age__c","label":"Age","displayOrder":2,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"JBCXM__CTA__c","fieldType":"DOUBLE","isGroupable":false,"hasJBCXMNS":false,"decimalPlaces":0},{"name":"JBCXM__CreatedDate__c","label":"Created Date","displayOrder":3,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"JBCXM__CTA__c","fieldType":"DATE","isGroupable":true,"hasJBCXMNS":false,"decimalPlaces":"0"}]',
	JBCXM__Dimensions__c = '[{"summerizedBy":"CW","objectName":"JBCXM__CTA__c","name":"JBCXM__CreatedDate__c","label":"Created Date","groupable":true,"aliasName":"Cat1","fieldType":"DATE","hasJBCXMNS":false,"stacked":false}]',
	JBCXM__FilterConditions__c = null,
	JBCXM__GraphType__c = 'LIST',
	JBCXM__HavingClause__c = '{"filterLogic":"","filterCriteria":[]}',
	JBCXM__IsRB__c = true,
	JBCXM__IsShown__c = true,
	JBCXM__IsStandard__c = false,
	JBCXM__Measures__c = '[{"objectName":"JBCXM__CTA__c","name":"JBCXM__Account__r.Name","label":"Count of Account Name","graphType":null,"aggType":"COUNT","aliasName":"DS1","fieldType":"TEXT","hasJBCXMNS":false,"decimalPlaces":0},{"objectName":"JBCXM__CTA__c","name":"JBCXM__Age__c","label":"Sum of Age","graphType":null,"aggType":"SUM","aliasName":"DS2","fieldType":"DOUBLE","hasJBCXMNS":false,"decimalPlaces":0}]',
	JBCXM__QueryOptions__c	= null,
	JBCXM__ReportParams__c	= null,
	JBCXM__SectionId__c = rList.Id,
	JBCXM__ShowDefault__c = false,
	JBCXM__UITabName__c = 'CTA',
	JBCXM__Visibility__c = 'Public',
	JBCXM__VisualType__c = 'Chart',
	JBCXM__WhereClause__c = '{"filterLogic":"JBCXM__1","filterCriteria":[{"value":"JBlast90","objectName":"JBCXM__CTA__c","fieldType":"TIMEFRAMENORMALDATE","logicalOperator":"AND","operator":"e","name":"JBCXM__CreatedDate__c","isNull":false,"fieldLabel":"Created Date","alias":"JBCXM__1","locked":false}]}'
);
pbr.add(viewObj);



//Summ by Year - Chart

	name = 'Auto_SummarizedByYear_Chart',
	JBCXM__AccountReference__c = 'JBCXM__Account__c',
	JBCXM__BaseObject__c = 'JBCXM__CTA__c',

);
pbr.add(viewObj);

	name = 'Auto_SummarizedByQuarter_Grid',

//Summ by Month - Grid
 viewObj = new JBCXM__UIViews__c(
	name = 'Auto_SummarizedByMonth_Grid',
	JBCXM__AccountReference__c = 'JBCXM__Account__c',
	JBCXM__BaseObject__c = 'JBCXM__CTA__c',

	JBCXM__ReportParams__c	= null,
	JBCXM__SectionId__c = rList.Id,
	JBCXM__ShowDefault__c = false,
	JBCXM__UITabName__c = 'CTA',
	JBCXM__Visibility__c = 'Public',
	JBCXM__VisualType__c = 'Chart',
	JBCXM__WhereClause__c = '{"filterLogic":"JBCXM__1","filterCriteria":[{"value":"JBprevcurfy","objectName":"JBCXM__CTA__c","fieldType":"TIMEFRAMENORMALDATE","logicalOperator":"AND","operator":"e","name":"JBCXM__CreatedDate__c","isNull":false,"fieldLabel":"Created Date","alias":"JBCXM__1","locked":false}]}'
);
pbr.add(viewObj);

insert pbr;

//To create Layout
JBCXM__Dashboard__c defaultLayout = new JBCXM__Dashboard__c(Name = 'SummarizedBy_Layout', JBCXM__IsActive__c = true,
												JBCXM__LayoutType__c = 'Home Page', JBCXM__Visibility__c 	= 'Public',
												JBCXM__User__c = Userinfo.getUserId() );
defaultLayout.JBCXM__FilterConditions__c = '{"maxCols":2,"layoutWidth":960,"margin":[8,8],"tileWidth":470,"tileHeight":300}';
insert defaultLayout;

//Creating container
List<JBCXM__DashboardContainer__c> dcList = new List<JBCXM__DashboardContainer__c>();
//lc layoutContainer
JBCXM__DashboardContainer__c lc = new JBCXM__DashboardContainer__c(JBCXM__AllowChange__c = false,
														JBCXM__Dashboard__c			= defaultLayout.Id,
														JBCXM__ContainerOptions__c	= '{"col":"1","row":"1","size_x":"2","size_y":"1"}',
														JBCXM__UIView__c			= pbr[0].Id,
														JBCXM__SourceType__c		= 'FORCE'
													);
dcList.add(lc);

lc = new JBCXM__DashboardContainer__c(JBCXM__AllowChange__c = false,
								JBCXM__Dashboard__c		= defaultLayout.Id,
								JBCXM__ContainerOptions__c	= '{"col":"1","row":"2","size_x":"2","size_y":"1"}',
								JBCXM__UIView__c			= pbr[1].Id,
								JBCXM__SourceType__c		= 'FORCE'
							);
dcList.add(lc);

lc = new JBCXM__DashboardContainer__c(JBCXM__AllowChange__c = false,
								JBCXM__Dashboard__c		= defaultLayout.Id,
								JBCXM__ContainerOptions__c	= '{"col":"1","row":"3","size_x":"2","size_y":"1"}',
								JBCXM__UIView__c			= pbr[2].Id,
								JBCXM__SourceType__c		= 'FORCE'
							);
dcList.add(lc);

lc = new JBCXM__DashboardContainer__c(JBCXM__AllowChange__c = false,
								JBCXM__Dashboard__c		= defaultLayout.Id,
								JBCXM__ContainerOptions__c	= '{"col":"1","row":"4","size_x":"2","size_y":"1"}',
								JBCXM__UIView__c			= pbr[3].Id,
								JBCXM__SourceType__c		= 'FORCE'
							);
dcList.add(lc);

lc = new JBCXM__DashboardContainer__c(JBCXM__AllowChange__c = false,
								JBCXM__Dashboard__c		= defaultLayout.Id,
								JBCXM__ContainerOptions__c	= '{"col":"1","row":"5","size_x":"2","size_y":"1"}',
								JBCXM__UIView__c			= pbr[4].Id,
								JBCXM__SourceType__c		= 'FORCE'
							);
dcList.add(lc);

lc = new JBCXM__DashboardContainer__c(JBCXM__AllowChange__c = false,
								JBCXM__Dashboard__c		= defaultLayout.Id,
								JBCXM__ContainerOptions__c	= '{"col":"1","row":"6","size_x":"2","size_y":"1"}',
								JBCXM__UIView__c			= pbr[5].Id,
								JBCXM__SourceType__c		= 'FORCE'
							);
dcList.add(lc);

lc = new JBCXM__DashboardContainer__c(JBCXM__AllowChange__c = false,
								JBCXM__Dashboard__c		= defaultLayout.Id,
								JBCXM__ContainerOptions__c	= '{"col":"1","row":"7","size_x":"2","size_y":"1"}',
								JBCXM__UIView__c			= pbr[6].Id,
								JBCXM__SourceType__c		= 'FORCE'
							);
dcList.add(lc);
lc = new JBCXM__DashboardContainer__c(JBCXM__AllowChange__c = false,
								JBCXM__Dashboard__c		= defaultLayout.Id,
								JBCXM__ContainerOptions__c	= '{"col":"1","row":"7","size_x":"2","size_y":"1"}',
								JBCXM__UIView__c			= pbr[7].Id,
								JBCXM__SourceType__c		= 'FORCE'
							);
dcList.add(lc);

insert dcList;
